search.name: Tom's Hardware
search.description:
Search Articles at Tom's Hardware.com
Usage:
thw <what> [/category:<category>]
Switch:
/category - Narrow your search to one of the following categories:
all - all categories (default)
mainboard - IMainboard
cpu - ICPU
graphic - IGraphic
display - IDisplay
video - IAudio/Video
storage - IStorage
network - INetwork
mobile - IMobile Devices
consumer - IPeripherals & Consumer
howto - IHowTo
business - IBusiness
Examples:
thw abit
thw duron /category:mainboard
